title: Fertilization and birth
creator_credit: Curtis Avery and Wexler Film Productions
brief_description: Uses animation and live action to describe for young children the reproductive processes from fertilization to birth in fish, birds, animals, and humans. Includes birth sequences of puppies and farm animals. Suitable for primary level.
description: Uses animation and live action to describe for young children the reproductive processes from fertilization to birth in fish, birds, animals, and humans. Includes birth sequences of puppies and farm animals. Suitable for primary level.
